desc: EPOARTIST RV WHEEL STABILIZER, PACK OF 2 | X-shaped chock, specially designed to eliminate back and forth movement. Take less than 30 seconds to install and no more rocking when people walking around inside the trailer.For Dual/Tandem Axles | Ratchet included.

layout.text: TIRED OF YOUR RV ROCKING BACK AND FORTH WHEN IT’S PARKED?
THIS SIMPLE X-SHAPED TIRE LOCK IS EASY TO INSTALL AND PROVIDES MAXIMUM STABILIZATION.
DON’T GO ON ANOTHER CAMPING TRIP WITHOUT IT!
